Html:
Development on Dynamic Data Display seems to have ceased (or at least nothing has been made public for many months).

There is a Microsoft (Pete Brown) site http://dotnet.uservoice.com/forums/40583-wpf-feature-suggestions where WPF features can be suggested and voted for (which the WPF team consider when deciding what to work on).

I have create an item requesting a chart control similar to the Dynamic Data Display control (see below).  You may wish to vote for this.

High Performance line graph control based on Dynamic Data Display

Support for a high performance line graph control based on (or similar to) the Microsoft Research Project Dynamic Data Display (http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/). Dynamic Data Display is great but work on this project appears to have stopped.

http://dotnet.uservoice.com/forums/40583-wpf-feature-suggestions/suggestions/1163661-high-performance-line-graph-control-based-on-dynam
This topic now has 15 votes and is moving up the rankings on WPF Feature Suggestions....

Come on people - if you like this libray, vote so that it gets attention from Miocrsoft!
 
David

Hi!

My name is Mikhail Brinchuk, and I am a developer of DynamicDataDisplay.

I'm searching now a remote job, so if you or your company can offer it to me, I will be very grateful.

If you want to customize DynamicDataDisplay somehow, I can help you to do it.

My CV is here - https://sites.google.com/site/thecentury/

Best regards,

Mikhail.
This topic now has 85 votes and is ranked 24th (out of 161 suggestions). 50 more votes to get onto first page of rankings....
131 votes.  2 more votes to get onto first page of the WPF features site.

Done, now it's on the first page! :)

Diego Frata
diego.frata@gmail.com

Mikhail Brinchuk,

It would be great if MS took a serious interest in the project, and we could get Mikhail involved again. Mikhail started a new project at http://d3future.codeplex.com/, but that has stalled out for the moment.
I think Mikhail's problem is just that he needs to make money - Microsoft should fund his work.
